pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Live Colour Ultra Brights Shocking Pink
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Schwarzkopf Live Colour Ultra Brights Shocking Pink semi-permanent colour adds condition and vivid shine with bright, vibrant colour results.

Live Colour Ultra Brights.

Schwarzkopf Live Colour Ultra Brights is a complete selection of intense, bright & colourful shades. Suitable for shimmering highlights or vibrant all over colour, Live Colour is an enriching colour mask that adds condition and vivid shine to your hair in one easy step. 

Change your hair colour as often as you like with Schwarzkopf Live Colour Ultra Brights!

Live Colour Ultra Brights Shocking Pink semi-permanent colour adds condition and vivid shine with bright, vibrant colour results.

No ammonia, maximum intensity & vibrancy, luminous shine that adds condition.

Lasts for 8 washes.

Suitable For: Shimmering highlights or vibrant colour all over

Size: 1 box

Hair Colour: Shocking Pink

Warnings

This product contains ingredients which may cause skin irritation to certain individuals. A preliminary test according to the accompanying directions should be made before use. This product must not be used for dyeing eyelashes or eyebrows; to do so may be injurious to the eye.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.

FIRST AID INFORMATION

For advice, contact a Poisons Information Centre (Phone Australia 13 11 26; New Zealand 0800 764 766) or a doctor. If in eyes, wash out immediately with water.

Ingredients

Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Coconut Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Disodium Cocoamphodipropionate, Methylparaben, Parfum, Polyquaternium-6, Propylparaben, Basic Violet 2, Ethanolamine, Etidronic Acid.

Directions

Quick & Easy to Apply:
- Shampoo and towel dry hair.
- Apply colour and leave on for 5 to 30 minutes.
- Rinse thoroughly and style as usual.
- For long or thick hair we recommend using two or more packs.

One Application:
- Instruction leaflet & gloves enclosed.

USAGE ADVICE

Gentle Conditioning Colour:
- Enriched with colour mask that adds superior condition and shine.
- Gentle formula contains no peroxide or ammonia.
- Will not lighten hair.
- Lasts up to 6 to 8 washes.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
